response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and my proposal aims to ensure that we both benefit from this transaction. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $1,200,000. This price reflects a fair compromise that acknowledges its true worth while allowing for a reasonable profit on my part. I believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both parties involved. Should you be interested in proceeding, please let me know promptly so we can finalize the details.", "product_price": 1200000}
